text_block_list.name: Satono Crown
text_block_list.text:
Alright, looks like there's no issue with setting up the venue. 
And practicing the evacuation drills finished on schedule……

text_block_list.name: Satono Crown
text_block_list.text:
Make sure to follow these procedures for the 
actual day too, everyone! Alright, let's keep 
pushing through to the actual performance!

text_block_list.name: Company Staff
text_block_list.text: Yes!

Satono Crown's father's business was tailoring, and this was 
an event where the students would have a chance to wear formal wear.

text_block_list.name: Satono Crown
text_block_list.text:
Hmmm-hmm, I've been keeping my eye on this 
for a while now, this sales opportunity……

text_block_list.name: Satono Crown
text_block_list.text:
After your debut, in addition to your competition 
clothes, proper formal wear is an absolute must-have 
for parties and awards ceremonies!

text_block_list.name: Satono Crown
text_block_list.text:
Since the Chairman has given her approval, I need 
to make sure this is a success. And then……next year 
hopefully we'll hold the event again……!

text_block_list.name: Satono Crown
text_block_list.text:
And if we do that, it'll create a stable demand every year! 
It'll also reduce the likelihood of everyone having to buy 
impromptu outfits for important events.

text_block_list.name: Satono Crown
text_block_list.text:
That's right! Well then, unfortunately we'd have to do this 
during lunch but, shall we have a meeting about public relations!?

And like this, Satono Crown was able to focus on 
her work, while I handled a lot of the simpler tasks.

text_block_list.name: Satono Crown
text_block_list.text: Trainer, can you have some more copies of this flyer printed out?

text_block_list.name: Horsegirls
text_block_list.text:
Huh~ Kura-chan, what are you doing? 
Oh, what's this? Some kind of event?

text_block_list.name: Satono Crown
text_block_list.text:
Good morning everyone! This time it's a meeting to 
focus on formal wear. There are some wonderful dresses 
and suits, so come on and check it out!

text_block_list.name: Satono Crown
text_block_list.text:
Umasta, UmaTok, UmaTube……the scheduled posts look perfect! 
That's right, maybe I should do a giveaway for the followers♪

text_block_list.name: Satono Crown
text_block_list.text:
Looks like the materials we're borrowing from the school 
won't be enough, huh. Maybe I should prepare……a full-length 
mirror, some lighting, and table for writing?

text_block_list.name: Satono Crown
text_block_list.text:
Trainer, I need to go stop by the company real quick, okay!? 
I need to help with the ordering process anyways.
choice_data_list: Got it! Anything else I can help with?

text_block_list.name: Satono Crown
text_block_list.text:
No, we're fine for today. 
Just relax until night training starts!

Even adults would have been impressed by how 
perfect her work was. On top of that, she came 
back exactly on time as the sun was setting……

text_block_list.name: Satono Crown
text_block_list.text: ――Haaaaaaaaa!

text_block_list.name: Satono Crown
text_block_list.text:
Good……everyday my times are getting shorter. 
It's going well……♪

Training went well and ended rather quickly. Her abilities 
were steadily improving too. Just how exceptional was she……?
choice_data_list: With this, in your next race……!

text_block_list.name: Satono Crown
text_block_list.text:
Right, I'll definitely win. But I can't let my guard down. 
After all, that girl will be competing next time……!

There were many strong competitors in Satono Crown's generation. 
Born in to a family of athletes, a rare elite――

text_block_list.name: Horsegirl C
text_block_list.text:
Ah, it's Duramente-san……! Her aura's crazy today too…… 
I guess it makes sense, she received an elite education……!

text_block_list.name: Horsegirl D
text_block_list.text:
And did you hear? In the next mock race, she'll 
be racing against that Crown-san. A showdown between 
elites, huh!? Uwaaah~ who's gonna win~?

text_block_list.name: Satono Crown
text_block_list.text:
Fufufuu, just the right amount of tension, huh? 
Guess that's what it's like when they've got high expecations.

text_block_list.name: Duramente
text_block_list.text:
……it's not bad. 
As a stage to prove my strength, and the worth of my bloodline.

text_block_list.name: Satono Crown
text_block_list.text:
『Pride in the family's blood』 is it? Everyone 
in your family has gotten results in various 
sports competitions and Uma Musume races, right?

text_block_list.name: Duramente
text_block_list.text:
Yes……As a descendant of that family, 
my duty is to prove my worth.

text_block_list.name: Duramente
text_block_list.text:
Crown, you also have a duty to your family as well, 
don't you? However I only want to prove I am the 
『Strongest』. Regardless of who my opponent is.

text_block_list.name: Satono Crown
text_block_list.text: OK. Your determination……I've heard it loud and clear.

text_block_list.name: Satono Crown
text_block_list.text: But, I also have pride in my family.

Was Satono Crown fired up because of a rival? 
She was putting even more effort in to her training and work.

text_block_list.name: Satono Crown
text_block_list.text: It's going well……I can do it……! I can accomplish both!

text_block_list.name: Satono Crown
text_block_list.text: I'm confident!

She was making effective use of her time and managing her health. 
Everything seemed to be perfect. ……However.

text_block_list.name: Satono Crown
text_block_list.text: Hu……uh……?

text_block_list.name: Satono Crown
text_block_list.text: Eh……wait? Did I really order this much fabric?

text_block_list.name: Satono Crown
text_block_list.text:
A briefing session……? 
No way, you're kidding me――Ah!

text_block_list.name: Satono Crown
text_block_list.text: It was that time! Uwaaah, I've gone and done it now~!!
